## How to configure gamification settings and view leader board?

Tina is a staff in an organisation and she has been assigned as the course
admin of Curricula. She would like to configure gamification settings to
improve the engagement and achievability of learners and view leaderboard to
track learners’ learning status.

#### Configure gamification settings

Let’s see how Tina will configure gamification settings.

1\. In Curricula, Tina clicks **Admin** on the left navigation pane, and then
clicks **Gamification configuration** and she is directed to the
**Gamification configuration** page.

2\. In the **Gamification configuration** page, she is in the **Leader board**
tab by default. She clicks **Skill badges** next to **Leader board** to switch
to the **Skill Badges** tab.

3\. In the **Skill badges** tab, she clicks **Create** to create a skill
badge.

4\. Tina uploads the badge image and fills in the badge information.

• **Prerequisite badges** – Add prerequisite badges as earning criteria and
learners can earn this badge after they earn prerequisite badges.

• **Courses** – Add core and elective courses as earning criteria and set the
minimum number of elective courses. Learners must pass all core courses and
the set number of elective courses to earn this badge.

5\. Tina clicks **Save** to save the badge.

6\. In the **Skill badges** tab, she selects the created badge and clicks
**Publish** to publish this badge for learners. She can also select other
unpublished badges to publish for learners.

If Tina wants to:

• Copy link of a badge – She can select a badge, and then click **Copy link**
to copy the badge link to send to learners or groups.

• Unpublish a badge – She can select a published badge, and then click
**Unpublish**. She can also unpublish multiple badges.

• View report of a badge – She can select the badge, and then click **View
report**.

***Note** : She can only unpublish, edit or delete a badge before someone
earns it.

#### View leader board

Let’s see how Tina will view leader board.

1\. In Curricula, Tina clicks **Admin** on the left navigation pane, and then
clicks **Gamification configuration**.

2\. She clicks a learner name to view achievement details in the **Leader
board** tab.

3\. She can click the **Rank by** drop-down list to select the leader board is
ranked by the number of points, passed courses or earned badges. She can also
click the Filters button to view the leader board within a certain date range.

4\. She can also click **Export** to export the leader board and basic
information of all learners to an Excel file.
